heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered snow showers mainly north of Route 11, wintry mix and rain possible in the Champlain Valley. Lows from the mid 20s to near 30. Light and variable wind.

heading: Monday
text: A few lingering snow showers north of Route 2 in the morning, dissipating in the afternoon. Highs in the low mid 40s, mid 30s to near 40 in the north. Northwest wind at 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Monday Night
text: Increasing clouds after midnight. Lows from the low to mid 20s in the northeast, in the upper 20s to low 30s elsewhere.
